attributes.action: Stop the proposed ban on CBD oil and derivative products in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Some of the articles appearing in the news in this regard:

https://www.express.co.uk/news/uk/1079800/brexit-news-CBD-oil-EU-food-regulations-european-commission-food-standards-agency

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-6641929/Watchdogs-plan-ban-popular-CBD-cannabis-oil-despite-experts-claiming-eases-anxiety.html

Sites showing some of the health benefits of CBD based products:

https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/cbd-oil-benefits

https://www.independent.co.uk/life-style/health-and-families/cbd-cannabis-oil-what-is-it-beauty-products-lifestyle-uses-marijuana-a8588256.html
attributes.background:
CBD oil has been used for some time now, and I am sure that many of us know people that have benefited from using CBD products.

As I understand it from the news the EU has decided that CBD should be banned from sale for some time. This would negatively impact many people and needs to be stopped.
